mapper.select: with driver_info as ( select d.d_id, m.m_name, c.car_no, c.car_model from driver d join corp co on d.D_ID = co.D_ID join car c on co.CAR_NO = c.car_no join MEMBER m on d.d_id = m.m_id ) select dp_id, start_place, finish_place, end_time, m_name, car_no, car_model from (select rownum rn, d.dp_id, d.start_place, d.finish_place, d.end_time, i.m_name, i.car_no, i.car_model from dispatch d, driver_info i, attend a where d.D_ID = i.D_ID and d.dp_id = a.dp_id and a.m_id = #{m_id} and d.DP_STATUS = '5' and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select po_exact, po_result, po_course, po_time, m_point from (select rownum rn, p.po_exact as po_exact , p.po_result as po_result , p.po_course as po_course , p.po_time as po_time, m.m_point as m_point from point p inner join member m on p.m_id = m.m_id where p.m_id = #{m_id} and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select corp_code, d_id, d_license_no , car_model from (select rownum rn, c.corp_code as corp_code , d.d_id as d_id, d.d_license_no as d_license_no , v.car_model as car_model from corp c inner join member m on c.d_id = m.m_id inner join driver d on c.d_id = d.d_id inner join car v on d.d_id = v.m_id where d.d_j_date is null and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from (select rownum rn, c.corp_code as corp_code , d.d_id as d_id, d.d_license_no as d_lisense_no , v.car_model as car_model from corp c inner join member m on c.d_id = m.m_id inner join driver d on c.d_id = d.d_id inner join car v on d.d_id = v.m_id where d.d_j_date is null)

select count(*) from (select h.merchant_uid, h.h_s_place , h_f_place, h.h_s_time, h.h_e_time, m.m_name,c.car_no, c.car_model from history h inner join member m on h.d_id = m.m_id inner join car c on m.m_id = c.m_id where h.m_id = #{m_id})
select count(*) from (select p.po_exact, p.po_result, p.po_course, p.po_time, m.m_point from point p inner join member m on p.m_id = m.m_id where p.m_id = #{m_id})

select d.dp_id, d.start_place, finish_place, start_time, end_time, m.m_name, c.car_no, c.car_model from (select DP_ID, START_PLACE, FINISH_PLACE, START_TIME, END_TIME, m_id,d_id from dispatch where m_id = #{m_id} and DP_STATUS = '5') d join member m on d.m_id = m.m_id join car c on d.d_id = c.m_id
